content:
@John David Larkin Nolen merged a PR to master yesterday. I will contact him with some additional info.

If I bump the kindling version to kindlingVersion=1.0.8-SNAPSHOT in my local build, it gives me clearer error messages:

publish.log

Mark Iantorno said:

You have conflicts on that branch? Please resolve those and I will rerun the PR for you.

Oh my bad, I missed that. I just resolved the conflict, and looks like build process is starting.
Kevin Power has marked this topic as resolved.
